20110103192152.000|20110103192154.000|CC1|DEDICATED TO THOSE WHO DIED IN  
20110103192154.000|20110103192157.000|CC1|WORLD WAR I, IT'S OUR SOLDIERS  
20110103192157.000|20110103192159.000|CC1|FIGHTING IN IRAQ AND            
20110103192159.000|20110103192200.000|CC1|AFGHANISTAN AND OUR ECONOMY     
20110103192200.000|20110103192202.000|CC1|CAUGHT IN THE UNDERTOW OF A     
20110103192202.000|20110103192204.000|CC1|DEEP AND PROLONGED RECESSION.   
20110103192204.000|20110103192206.000|CC1|BUT SO MANY PEOPLE OUT OF WORK  
20110103192206.000|20110103192209.000|CC1|AND SO MANY FAMILIES LOSING     
20110103192209.000|20110103192211.000|CC1|THEIR HOMES TO FORECLOSURE,     
20110103192211.000|20110103192213.000|CC1|IT'S NOT SURPRISING THAT VOTERS 
20110103192213.000|20110103192214.000|CC1|TELL US THEY'RE WORRIED AND     
20110103192214.000|20110103192218.000|CC1|BELIEVE THAT CALIFORNIA IS ON   
20110103192218.000|20110103192219.000|CC1|THE WRONG TRACK.                
20110103192219.000|20110103192222.000|CC1|YET IN THE FACE OF HUGE BUDGET  
20110103192222.000|20110103192224.000|CC1|DEFICITS YEAR AFTER YEAR AND    
20110103192224.000|20110103192225.000|CC1|THE FIRST CREDIT RATING AMONG   
20110103192225.000|20110103192227.000|CC1|THE 50 STATES, OUR TWO          
20110103192227.000|20110103192229.000|CC1|POLITICAL PARTIES CAN'T COME    
20110103192229.000|20110103192231.000|CC1|CLOSE TO AGREING ON WHAT THE    
20110103192231.000|20110103192234.000|CC1|RIGHT PATH FORWARD IS.          
20110103192234.000|20110103192236.000|CC1|THEY REMAIN IN THEIR RESPECTIVE 
20110103192236.000|20110103192238.000|CC1|COMFORT ZONE, REHEARSING AND    
20110103192238.000|20110103192239.000|CC1|REHASHING OLD POLITICAL         
20110103192239.000|20110103192240.000|CC1|POSITIONS.                      
20110103192240.000|20110103192241.000|CC1|PERHAPS THAT'S THE REASON WHY   
20110103192241.000|20110103192243.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC HOLDS THE STATE      
20110103192243.000|20110103192247.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN SUCH LOW ESTEEM.  
20110103192247.000|20110103192248.000|CC1|AND THAT'S A PROFOUND PROBLEM,  
20110103192248.000|20110103192250.000|CC1|NOT JUST FOR THOSE OF US WHO    
20110103192250.000|20110103192251.000|CC1|ARE ELECTED BUT FOR THE WHOLE   
20110103192251.000|20110103192253.000|CC1|SYSTEM OF SELF GOVERNMENT.      
20110103192253.000|20110103192257.000|CC1|WITHOUT THE TRUST OF THE        
20110103192257.000|20110103192259.000|CC1|PEOPLE, POLITICS DEGENERATE     
20110103192259.000|20110103192302.000|CC1|INTO MERE SPECTACLE AND         
20110103192302.000|20110103192303.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY DECLINES LEAVING      
20110103192303.000|20110103192307.000|CC1|CYNICISM TO FILL THE VOID.      
20110103192307.000|20110103192310.000|CC1|THE YEAR AHEAD WILL DEMAND      
20110103192310.000|20110103192311.000|CC1|COURAGE AND SACRIFICE.          
20110103192311.000|20110103192313.000|CC1|THE BUDGET I PROPOSED WILL      
20110103192313.000|20110103192314.000|CC1|ASSUME THAT EACH OF US WHO ARE  
20110103192314.000|20110103192318.000|CC1|ELECTED TO DO THE PEOPLE'S      
20110103192318.000|20110103192320.000|CC1|BUSINESS WILL RISE ABOVE        
20110103192320.000|20110103192321.000|CC1|IDEOLOGY AND PARTISAN INTEREST  
20110103192321.000|20110103192323.000|CC1|AND FIND WHAT'S REQUIRED FOR    
20110103192323.000|20110103192324.000|CC1|THE GOOD OF CALIFORNIA.         
20110103192324.000|20110103192334.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110103192334.000|20110103192336.000|CC1|THERE'S NO OTHER WAY FORWARD.   
20110103192336.000|20110103192337.000|CC1|IN THIS CRISIS, WE HAVE TO      
20110103192337.000|20110103192340.000|CC1|LEARN TO WORK TOGETHER.         
20110103192340.000|20110103192342.000|CC1|AS CALIFORNIANS FIRST, MEMBERS  
20110103192342.000|20110103192350.000|CC1|OF A POLITICAL PARTY SECOND.    
20110103192350.000|20110103192352.000|CC1|IN SEEKING THE OFFICER OF       
20110103192352.000|20110103192353.000|CC1|GOVERNOR, I SAID I WOULD BE     
20110103192353.000|20110103192355.000|CC1|GUIDED BY THREE PRINCIPLES.     
20110103192355.000|20110103192358.000|CC1|FIRST, SPEAK THE TRUTH.         
20110103192358.000|20110103192404.000|CC1|NO MORE SMOKING MIRRORS, NO     
20110103192404.000|20110103192405.000|CC1|MORE EMPTY PROMISES.            
20110103192405.000|20110103192407.000|CC1|SECOND, NO NEW TAXES UNLESS THE 
20110103192407.000|20110103192410.000|CC1|PEOPLE VOTE FOR THEM.           
20110103192410.000|20110103192415.000|CC1|AND THIRD, RETURN AS MUCH AS    
20110103192415.000|20110103192416.000|CC1|POSSIBLE DECISIONS AND          
20110103192416.000|20110103192417.000|CC1|AUTHORITY TO CITIES AND         
20110103192417.000|20110103192418.000|CC1|COUNTIES AND SCHOOLS CLOSEST TO 
20110103192418.000|20110103192424.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE.                     
20110103192424.000|20110103192425.000|CC1|WITH YOUR HELP, THAT'S EXACTLY  
20110103192425.000|20110103192426.000|CC1|WHAT I INTEND TO DO.            
20110103192426.000|20110103192429.000|CC1|THE BUDGET I PRESENT NEXT WEEK  
20110103192429.000|20110103192431.000|CC1|WILL BE PAINFUL BUT IT WILL BE  
20110103192431.000|20110103192433.000|CC1|AN HONEST BUDGET.               
20110103192433.000|20110103192434.000|CC1|THE GUIDANCE OF SPENDING WILL   
20110103192434.000|20110103192437.000|CC1|BE MATCHED WITH AVAILABLE TAX   
20110103192437.000|20110103192439.000|CC1|REVENUES AND SPECIFIC PROPOSALS 
20110103192439.000|20110103192441.000|CC1|WILL BE OFFERED TO REALIGN KEY  
20110103192441.000|20110103192442.000|CC1|FUNCTIONS THAT ARE CURRENTLY    
20110103192442.000|20110103192444.000|CC1|SPREAD BETWEEN STATE AND LOCAL  
20110103192444.000|20110103192447.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN WAYS THAT ARE     
20110103192447.000|20110103192449.000|CC1|COMPLEX, CONFUSING AND          
20110103192449.000|20110103192449.000|CC1|INEFFICIENT.                    
20110103192449.000|20110103192453.000|CC1|MY GOAL IS TO ACHIEVE GREATER   
20110103192453.000|20110103192455.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABILITY AND REDUCE THE   
20110103192455.000|20110103192455.000|CC1|HISTORIC SHIFTING               
20110103192455.000|20110103192456.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY BACK AND FORTH   
20110103192456.000|20110103192500.000|CC1|FROM ONE LEVEL OF GOVERNMENT TO 
20110103192500.000|20110103192501.000|CC1|ANOTHER.                        
20110103192501.000|20110103192503.000|CC1|A PLAN REPRESENTS MY BEST       
20110103192503.000|20110103192504.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDING OF OUR REAL       
20110103192504.000|20110103192506.000|CC1|DILEMMAS AND POSSIBILITIES.     
20110103192506.000|20110103192508.000|CC1|IT'S A TOUGH BUDGET FOR TOUGH   
20110103192508.000|20110103192508.000|CC1|TIMES.                          
20110103192508.000|20110103192511.000|CC1|WHEN DEALING WITH A BUDGET GAP

20110103192520.000|20110103192521.000|CC1|YES, GOVERNMENT WASTES MONEY

20110103192529.000|20110103192530.000|CC1|BUT GOVERNMENT ALSO PAVES THE

20110103192542.000|20110103192543.000|CC1|UNIVERSITIES, PARKS, HEALTH

20110103192555.000|20110103192556.000|CC1|DIFFICULT DECISIONS TAKEN.      
20110103192556.000|20110103192559.000|CC1|AT THIS STAGE OF ANY LIFE, I'VE 
20110103192559.000|20110103192603.000|CC1|NOT COME HERE TO EMBRACE DELAY  
20110103192603.000|20110103192604.000|CC1|AND DENIAL.                     
20110103192604.000|20110103192614.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110103192614.000|20110103192615.000|CC1|IN REFLECTING ON OUR            
20110103192615.000|20110103192617.000|CC1|DIFFICULTIES, MY THOUGHTS TURN  
20110103192617.000|20110103192619.000|CC1|TO THOSE WHO PRECEDED ME AND    
20110103192619.000|20110103192620.000|CC1|WHAT THEY FACED AND WHAT THEY   
20110103192620.000|20110103192622.000|CC1|WERE ABLE TO ACCOMPLISH.        
20110103192622.000|20110103192625.000|CC1|MY FATHER WHO TOOK THE OATH OF  
20110103192625.000|20110103192627.000|CC1|OFFICE AS GOVERNOR 52 YEARS     
20110103192627.000|20110103192631.000|CC1|AGO, HIS MOTHER IDA BORN ON A   
20110103192631.000|20110103192636.000|CC1|RANCH IN 1878 AND HER FATHER    
20110103192636.000|20110103192638.000|CC1|LEFT MISSOURI IN 1852 AND       
20110103192638.000|20110103192641.000|CC1|TRAVELED ACROSS THE PLAINS TO   
20110103192641.000|20110103192641.000|CC1|SACRAMENTO.                     
20110103192641.000|20110103192646.000|CC1|I TRIED TO IMAGINE THE          
20110103192646.000|20110103192646.000|CC1|DIFFICULTIES MY GREAT           
20110103192646.000|20110103192648.000|CC1|GRANDFATHER CONFRONTED AS HE    
20110103192648.000|20110103192649.000|CC1|LEFT GERMANY AND CAME TO        
20110103192649.000|20110103192651.000|CC1|AMERICA AND ACROSS THE PLAINS   
20110103192651.000|20110103192652.000|CC1|AND OVER THE SIERRAS INTO       
20110103192652.000|20110103192653.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.                     
20110103192653.000|20110103192655.000|CC1|LET ME READ FROM THE DIARY THAT 
20110103192655.000|20110103192659.000|CC1|HE KEPT DURING HIS LONG TREK    
20110103192659.000|20110103192700.000|CC1|WESTWARD.                       
20110103192700.000|20110103192702.000|CC1|ON THE 26th OF JUNE, WE CAME TO 
20110103192702.000|20110103192703.000|CC1|THE FIRST DESERT.               
20110103192703.000|20110103192705.000|CC1|IT WAS 41 MILES.                
20110103192705.000|20110103192708.000|CC1|WE WENT THERE AT NIGHT AND RODE 
20110103192708.000|20110103192709.000|CC1|19 HOURS IN IT.                 
20110103192709.000|20110103192713.000|CC1|ON THE 26th OF JULY, WE CAME TO 
20110103192713.000|20110103192715.000|CC1|THE SECOND LARGE PLAIN.         
20110103192715.000|20110103192717.000|CC1|ALSO 40 MILES LONG.             
20110103192717.000|20110103192719.000|CC1|HERE WE LOST SEVEN OXEN THAT    
20110103192719.000|20110103192721.000|CC1|DIED OF FIRST, THOUSANDS OF     
20110103192721.000|20110103192724.000|CC1|COWS, HORSES AND MULES WERE     
20110103192724.000|20110103192725.000|CC1|LYING ABOUT DEAD.               
20110103192725.000|20110103192727.000|CC1|THE DISCARDED WAGON BY THE      
20110103192727.000|20110103192730.000|CC1|HUNDREDS WERE DRIVEN TOGETHER   
20110103192730.000|20110103192731.000|CC1|AND BUSHED.                     
20110103192731.000|20110103192732.000|CC1|WE SAW WAGONS STANDING THAT     
20110103192732.000|20110103192734.000|CC1|WOULD NEVER BE TAKEN OUT AGAIN  
20110103192734.000|20110103192736.000|CC1|AND MORE THAN 1,000 GUNS HAVE   
20110103192736.000|20110103192737.000|CC1|BEEN BROKEN UP.                 
20110103192737.000|20110103192739.000|CC1|HERE ON THIS 40 MILES, OUR      
20110103192739.000|20110103192742.000|CC1|TREASURES THAT CAN NEVER BE     
20110103192742.000|20110103192743.000|CC1|TAKEN OUT AGAIN.                
20110103192743.000|20110103192745.000|CC1|WE CAN ONLY IMAGINE WHAT IT     
20110103192745.000|20110103192747.000|CC1|TOOK FOR HIM TO LEAVE HIS       
20110103192747.000|20110103192748.000|CC1|FAMILY AND HOME AND TRAVEL      
20110103192748.000|20110103192750.000|CC1|ACROSS THE OCEAN TO AMERICA AND 
20110103192750.000|20110103192753.000|CC1|THEN ACROSS THE COUNTRY, OFTEN  
20110103192753.000|20110103192754.000|CC1|THROUGH DANGEROUS AND HOSTILE   
20110103192754.000|20110103192756.000|CC1|TERRITORY IN A WAGON TRAIN.     
20110103192756.000|20110103192800.000|CC1|BUT CAME HE DID.

20110103193126.000|20110103193131.000|CC1|I SET A GOAL OF 20,000          
20110103193131.000|20110103193132.000|CC1|MEGAWATTS OF RENEWABLE ENERGY

20110103193132.000|20110103193134.000|CC1|I INTEND TO MAKE IT BY THE      
20110103193134.000|20110103193135.000|CC1|APPOINTMENTS I MAKE AND THE     
20110103193135.000|20110103193136.000|CC1|ACTIONS THEY TAKE.              
20110103193136.000|20110103193138.000|CC1|THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS 
20110103193138.000|20110103193141.000|CC1|OF NEW JOBS TO BE CREATED.      
20110103193141.000|20110103193142.000|CC1|IT'S CALIFORNIA REGULATORY      
20110103193142.000|20110103193143.000|CC1|AUTHORITY MAKE SENSIBLE AND     
20110103193143.000|20110103193143.000|CC1|BOLD DECISIONS.                 
20110103193143.000|20110103193145.000|CC1|IT WILL ALSO BE NECESSARY TO    
20110103193145.000|20110103193148.000|CC1|MAKE SURE OUR LAWS AND RULES    
20110103193148.000|20110103193150.000|CC1|FOCUS ON OUR MOST IMPORTANT     
20110103193150.000|20110103193153.000|CC1|OBJECTIVE, MINIMIZING DELAYS    
20110103193153.000|20110103193153.000|CC1|AND UNNECESSARY COSTS.          
20110103193153.000|20110103193155.000|CC1|I'LL MEET NOT ONLY WITH LEADERS 
20110103193155.000|20110103193158.000|CC1|OF ENERGY COMPANIES BUT WITH    
20110103193158.000|20110103193159.000|CC1|EXECUTIVES FROM A BROAD RANGE

20110103193206.000|20110103193208.000|CC1|WE'LL BREAK THE BARRIERS THAT   
20110103193208.000|20110103193209.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN HOLDING US BACK.      
20110103193209.000|20110103193212.000|CC1|WE LIVE, AFTER ALL --           
20110103193212.000|20110103193216.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110103193216.000|20110103193219.000|CC1|WE LIVE AFTER ALL IN THE EIGHTH 
20110103193219.000|20110103193220.000|CC1|LARGEST ECONOMY IN THE WORLD.   
20110103193220.000|20110103193223.000|CC1|OVER THE LAST SEK AID,          
20110103193223.000|20110103193226.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA HAS ACTUALLY         
20110103193226.000|20110103193230.000|CC1|OUTPACED THE NATION IN OUR      
20110103193230.000|20110103193231.000|CC1|GROSS NATIONAL PRODUCT.         
20110103193231.000|20110103193232.000|CC1|THAT MEANS EVERY PERSON WORKING 
20110103193232.000|20110103193234.000|CC1|IN THIS STATE IS WORKING MORE   
20110103193234.000|20110103193238.000|CC1|EFFECTIVE  -- EFFECTIVELY IN    
20110103193238.000|20110103193242.000|CC1|TERMS OF WHAT IS PRODUCED THAN  
20110103193242.000|20110103193247.000|CC1|IN ANY OTHER STATE.             
20110103193247.000|20110103193247.000|CC1|ASIDE FROM ECONOMIC ADVANCE, I  
20110103193247.000|20110103193249.000|CC1|WANT TO MAKE SURE WE DO

20110103193317.000|20110103193328.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110103193328.000|20110103193329.000|CC1|ONE OF OUR NATIVE SONS BECAME   
20110103193329.000|20110103193332.000|CC1|FOR A TIME ONE OF THE MOST      
20110103193332.000|20110103193334.000|CC1|FAMOUS OF AMERICAN PHILOSOPHERS.
20110103193334.000|20110103193336.000|CC1|HE WAS BORN IN 1855 IN A MINING 
20110103193336.000|20110103193338.000|CC1|CAMP THAT LATER BECAME THE TOWN 
20110103193338.000|20110103193340.000|CC1|OF GRASS VALLEY.                
20110103193340.000|20110103193344.000|CC1|I MENTION HIM BECAUSE HIS       
20110103193344.000|20110103193345.000|CC1|PHILOSOPHY OF LOYALTY OF

20110103193405.000|20110103193408.000|CC1|AND BEYOND OUR NARROW

20110103193428.000|20110103193431.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND HOW THIS LOYALTY TO  
20110103193431.000|20110103193432.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA WAS MY FATHER'S
